CustomField.label: Portal Fields Config
CustomField.description: JSON configuration for portal field visibility. Controls which fields appear on case forms. E.g. {"showPriority":true,"showCategory":true,"showType":false,"customFields":[]}
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Advanced: JSON controlling which fields appear on case forms. Normally managed from Portal Settings in the admin UI. Only edit here if you need to override the UI-managed config.
